name: Relisir
overview:
Relisir is a resource for any music fan wanting to find out when their favorite bands announce and release new albums.

Using various APIs from vendors, and music sites Relisir finds information about any upcoming releases from artists and bands, and make this information available to the users. Bands and individuals can also add entries that are not yet in the database, helping create the most complete library of upcoming music releases.

Registered users receive email notifications when albums are announced and again when the release is made, also pointing them in the direction where they can purchase it. To make adding favorite artists to a users account simple, Relisir can import lists of artists from existing music services and social networks on which you have an account.

API and iPhone applications are in the works.
